data.text: Great hotel, in a good location for site seeing. It was my wife's birthday and the hotel had left her a bottle of Cava and some chocolates when we arrived. We booked the breakfast which was also really nice. I would recommend to family and friends
data.title: Great Break in Barcelona at Aparthotel Silver

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, It's such a pleasure to receive your feedback! We're delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us, and found our location useful and convenient for your needs.  
Remember next time if you  book directly through our web , you'll have discounts
Thank you once again.We hope to welcome you back to Aparthotel Silver,your home in Barcelona, in the future. Kind regards, Sandra Benedito, Manager
owner_response.author: Ignasi Junyent Barbany

data.text:
The Hotel is located just 100m from a Tube station and 50m from a bus stop that both take you to the central tourist areas in a few minutes. It is situated in the thriving Gracia area which is a more local area with great shops, restaurants, cafes and bakeries. It is away from the busier tourist areas but has lots of life, is really friendly and felt totally safe. 
The hotel is modern and extremely clean. The staff were really friendly. The rooms have a sink, hob, microwave and basic equipment that enable you to eat in if you wish after shopping in one of the many local shops. 
The hotel is 3 minutes from one of the less popular and less commercialised Gaudi attractions, being Casa Vicens. 
The room, hotel and area were a sanctuary away from the extremely busy tourist areas, even in March. Highly recommend this hotel. Would definitely return without hesitation.
data.title: First Class Hotel in Great Gracia Area

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Lewisk, We greatly appreciate your comments. We are very happy that your stay has been satisfactory. We love working for clients like you, you are our essence. We hope to see you again in the future, remember that if you book through our web you have discounts. We are waiting for you at your home in Barcelona, happy day, Sandra Benedito, Manager
owner_response.author: Ignasi Junyent Barbany

data.text: Love this hotel!  It was so clean, the staff were fabulous…..so friendly and helpful!  and the location is great…… 3 minute walk to the Metro!  I highly recommend it!  Would absolutely stay there again!
data.title: Love this hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Willie, many thanks for your nice opinion. We're very happy that you found the location and the staff to be great.We hope we can welcome you again. Remember that if you reserve trhough our web, you'll have discounts, have a nice day, Sandra Benedito, Manager
owner_response.author: Ignasi Junyent Barbany

data.text:
Even our cabbie who dropped us off at the hotel had high praise!  The reception people were very pleasant and helpful. Loved the room! Little kitchen area with every utensil you’ll need, great fridge, and good size bathroom. 
And saving the best for last, the location is perfect! Not touristy but very convenient to everything you need. Train/subway station just a block away, great restaurants and shopping all within walking distance.
We loved our stay here!
data.title: Great little hotel in a wonderful location.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Gmeak, many thanks for your great opinion. We are glad that you liked the location and the staff.We hope we can welcome you again. Rememeber that if tou reserve through our web, you have discounts, Have a nice day, Sandra Benedito, Manager
owner_response.author: Ignasi Junyent Barbany

data.text:
Stayed here a year ago in September 2022. Looked at many places and areas in Barcelona and hoped the reviews were true. And they were. 

It’s a small hotel that was in a good location in a safe area for a solo female traveler. Close to metro (about a block away) with many stores, bakeries, and restaurants close by. The room was fine for one person with a small kitchenette and fridge. Comfortable bed and clean room. Breakfast (added cost) was ok with a served plate of hams and cheeses with croissant and a cup of coffee and juice or tea. 

Staff was friendly and helpful with any questions and recommendations. I remember having several nice chats with Dafne and she was great. It’s within walking distance to the center (about 20 mins or so) and not in a busy touristy area, which I liked. It was also quiet at night and you would get a good nights sleep. 

I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again especially if you’re traveling solo. Good safe location with a good staff!
data.title: Nice quiet hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Martha, many thanks for your nice review. We're happy that your stay was satisfactory. Remeber that if tou reserve through our web, you have discounts and the breakfast for the 2nd person included. We hope we can welcome you again, have a nice day, Sandra Benedito, Manager
owner_response.author: Ignasi Junyent Barbany
